name: Finding Cultists
description:
**A submission for Mini Jam 32: Explosions**

The Doomsday Cult is preparing some hideouts in order to summon Lord Apocalypse and bring the end of the world. Go blast those hideouts with your explosives!

Disclaimer: Yes, this is Minesweeper with hexagonal tiles.

How to Find Your Cultist:

  • Click on any tile.
  • Decide your action: bomb it or inspect it.
  • Good luck!

Credits:

  • Programming: juunishi master
  • Music: Eric Matyas
  • Art: Kenney Assets
